title: Unable to unlock phone after Android 12 Beta with Pixel 5
content:
After I updated my Pixel 5 to Android 12 with Beta Program, it tells me if I want to copy data from other phone (the thing shows up after factory reset).
When I plugged my older phone, it shows errors like wrong cable etc.
When I tab I don't have phone, it tells me to put PIN code.
But it goes back to connect older phone.
I tried  pressing every single button combinations but it won't proceed after typing PIN.

I tried to use Google Pixel Update and Software Repair, but it says the phone is later version than repair tool, so it can't do anything.

I tried to use ADB to flash Android 11 but OEM is locked, and fastboot flashing unlock doesn't work.

I tried factory reset using recovery mode, but still here.

Can someone please help me?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 5
